pkgmetadata.longdescription: Laser Offset============Simple Tools that creates external and internal offsets for shapes. Supports DXF and SVG Import/Export. This project is in early alpha and was created as side-project for hobby.![Generated outlines Sample as SVG file](https://gist.githubusercontent.com/AndreyZarembo/ff74e14fa055ce41440176f0b22c0562/raw/965e9639e099d18c8249dd02d0a7bbac7184cc69/output.svg)Installing----------Install and update using `pip`:``` $ pip install -U laser_offset```Usage-----``` Usage: laser_offset [OPTIONS] SOURCE_PATH TARGET_PATH LASER_WIDTH Creates new drawings from DXFs with outer and inner offset lines by LASER_WIDTH in μm(microns) ans save them into TARGET_PATH as SVG or DXF. SOURCE_PATH is folder with DXFs for batch convertion TARGET_PATH is folder for results LASER_WIDTH is beam diameter in μm(microns) from 1 to 999 Options: -s, --svg Output as SVG [default: (False)] -d, --dxf / -D, --no-dxf Output as DXF [default: (True)] --help Show this message and exit.```**Example:**`laser_offset . ./output -s 150`Limitations-----------1. Can't handle arcs less that half of laser width2. Ignores layers, text, shape size and styles
